page.title: 02Dairy Farming
page.content: Throughout the area there are approximately sixteen farms where dairying is carried on. Mostly all of these farms have been handed down from father to son over many years .Many of these farms have never been modernised and the only things that have been changed are the machines used on the farms , and the way that the milk is collected and transported.Today the milk is stored in tanks at the farm and collected daily by milk tankers who take it away to be bottled. The tankers call twice a day and the milk is sold to the main dairies around the area e.g Dairy Crest and Northern Dairies.
